title: Grateful Dead Live at Saratoga Performing Arts Center on 1983-06-18
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi DR-2 > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 2448 tagged. Transferred by Andrew F. 03/2012
source: AUD: 2x Beyer M-88's > Sony TC-D5M > Maxell MX-90s, recorded from inside the pavilion, directly behind the soundboard area, taped by Joe Morrone.
